name: tm83
effect: Teaches Natural Gift to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Work Up to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Natural Gift)

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user draws power from the Berry it is holding to attack. The Berry determines its type and power.
flavor_text.platinum: The user draws power from the Berry it is holding to attack. The Berry determines its type and power.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user draws power from the Berry it is holding to attack. The Berry determines its type and power.
